item.title: Hugo + GitHub Pages로 블로그 만들기
item.author: 2ynhub
item.description: 1. 환경 Linux hugo git GitHub 2. 개요 Hugo로 블로그를 만들고 GitHub Pages에 호스팅하겠습니다. 블로그의 주소는 https://<깃헙 아이디>.git

item.title: Test Post
item.author: 2ynhub
item.description: Hello World! 안녕하세요. 1. first first content anything print('a') 2. second second content Fusion Drive combines a hard drive with a flash storage (solid-state drive) and presents it as a single logical volume with the space of both drives combined.
